page.title: 04LOCAL TRADITIONS 2
page.content:
THE DONKEY DERBY The Donkey Derby is a fete with a difference.There are all the stalls and rides that are at all fetes but the main point of this fete is the donkey races.The donkeys have only a bridle and they are not broken in.At the start,each jockey has to vault on and then try to make his donkey finish 1st,2nd or 3rd.The jockeys in the first three places get points as well as rosettes.At the end of the day,as a last race,the eight jockeys with the most points have a race to see who is champion jockey and that jockey gets a "champion" rosette and a cup.People bet on the races and the whole derby is sponsored by the Round Table.
Caroline Packer.
